Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Earn 1.4 air miles for every S$1 spent locally and 2.8 air miles for every S$1 spent with contactless payment.
Earn 2.8 air miles for every S$1 spend on direct bookings with Qantas and Jetstar airlines or retail spend in Australia and New Zealand.
Receive 10,000 air miles upon annual card renewal.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: The 2.8 air miles promotion is limited to 14,000 Travel$ per Principal Cardmember per calendar month.
The annual renewal bonus gift of 10,000 air miles is valid for Cardmembers who renew and pay their annual fee from the 2nd year of membership onwards.

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureRequire: 1. Minimum spend of at least S$500 using ANZ Travel Visa Signature Card within 30 days of card approval is required 2. Promotion period from 1 November 2016 - 29 February 2016. Receive application approval from bank by 15th March 2015. 3. Only applicable to New-to-Bank customers.

Details.Name: Online Shopping
Details.Feature: S$1 (spent on Qantas and Jetstar airlines) = 2.8 miles
